snippet: Also, no afternoon TV program has broken out of the pack since the end of Oprah Winfrey's show, and Gordon Brown contradicts earlier testimony in Britain's inquiry into press ethics.
abstract: Also, no afternoon TV program has broken out of the pack since the end of Oprah Winfrey's show, and Gordon Brown contradicts earlier testimony in Britain's inquiry into press ethics.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Spinning in Syria, and a 'No Fuss' Coming Out for Gay Actor
